data: Our auditory analyst compares 770 artists’ live recordings with their and studio counterparts. Music snobs rejoice!
Is “ass” the most complicated word in English? We tracked down 201 historic usages and compared it to other slang.
is a journalist-engineer at The Pudding. He rarely ventures out of his neighborhood, where he has a piano, climbing gym, and a veritable bevy of bars/cafes/restaurants in close proximity.
